answers.answer: has her blood pressure been taken lately?if not you may want to get that checked out.the same thing happened to my cousin.she was almost 7 months pregnant and her arms and legs became numb and they found protein in her urine and diagnosed her with preeclampsia and took the baby..so please get that checked

I had something similar when I was 12 weeks Pregnant. It would only happen at night when I went to bed. I wouldn't be able to catch my breath...I would get chest pains and pains running through my arms. My doctor said it was anxiety...which is still really bad. So I would definitely have your daughter go see her doctor to make sure everything is okay.Good Luck!

question: my 19 yr old daughter is 5 months pregnant and has just recently began getting chest pains ans shortness of breath and her left arm sometimes goes numb can anyone tell me what is causing this and how it can be fixed as she doesnt sleep much because of it
title: pregnancy
